description: This table stores the information about second sign for orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the status of the second sign.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No second sign needed


Needs second sign


Second sign rejected


Second sign accepted


Second sign modify

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_FIRS_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant at which the first sign occurred.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_MESSAGE
columns.description: This is the message shown to the user.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_REQUIRE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the second sign requirement that this order was signed with.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Manually Set


System Set Peer Review


System Set Required


Linked Order

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_SIGNER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the secondary signing user.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_SEC_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant at which the second sign occurred.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_REJECT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason that this order was rejected.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medication Refill Refused

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_COMMENT
columns.description: This stores the comment for the rejection.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_REJECT_ID
columns.description: This is the ID of the rejection message that is sent.

columns.name: SEC_SIGN_INDIV_YN
columns.description:
Whether individual review was required for this order when second signing the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
